data.text:
――Katsuragi Ace was training early in the morning today again. 
Pushing herself to the limits while dripping with sweat.
data.processed:
<story>――Katsuragi Ace was training early in the morning today again. 
<story>Pushing herself to the limits while dripping with sweat.

data.text:
Seeing Katsuragi Ace like that, wanting to tell 
her what I had decided, I walked over to her.
data.processed:
<story>Seeing Katsuragi Ace like that, wanting to tell 
<story>her what I had decided, I walked over to her.

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa……Kuu, haa…… 
Faster……faster, to get ahead of everyone……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa……Kuu, haa…… 
<story>Faster……faster, to get ahead of everyone……!

data.text:
……Haa……huh? 
Trainer-san? Haa……mornin', what's up?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……Haa……huh? 
<story>Trainer-san? Haa……mornin', what's up?

data.text:
Feeling a tightening in my chest, I look straight 
at Katsuragi Ace. And then I take a deep breath――
data.processed:
<story>Feeling a tightening in my chest, I look straight 
<story>at Katsuragi Ace. And then I take a deep breath――

data.text:
Ah……Ooh……? What're you saying all of a sudden? 
Um, scouting……for real?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Ah……Ooh……? What're you saying all of a sudden? 
<story>Um, scouting……for real?

data.text:
I tell Katsuragi Ace about what I've 
been feeling these past few days.
data.processed:
<story>I tell Katsuragi Ace about what I've 
<story>been feeling these past few days.

data.text:
I couldn't take my eyes off her as she straight-forwardly 
chased her dream. But more than that, for Katsuragi 
Ace who speaks of her dreams with pride――

choices.text: I want to support you with all I have

data.processed:
<story>I couldn't take my eyes off her as she straight-forwardly 
<story>chased her dream. But more than that, for Katsuragi 
<story>Ace who speaks of her dreams with pride――

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text:
The Ace of the Uma Musume world. How many obstacles will 
be on that path? For how long will that path continue on?
data.processed:
<story>The Ace of the Uma Musume world. How many obstacles will 
<story>be on that path? For how long will that path continue on?

data.text:
When I thought about that, it made me want to 
walk that path with her. ――The more difficult 
it was, the more I wanted to be there for her.
data.processed:
<story>When I thought about that, it made me want to 
<story>walk that path with her. ――The more difficult 
<story>it was, the more I wanted to be there for her.

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
……I've been told that my dream is an incredibly long road. That 
it's unreachable, and might as well be in a different world.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……I've been told that my dream is an incredibly long road. That 
<story>it's unreachable, and might as well be in a different world.

data.text:
I didn't want to accept it. There was no way I wanted 
to accept that. Of course, even now……I'm giving 
my all to show that it's not 『Another World』.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>I didn't want to accept it. There was no way I wanted 
<story>to accept that. Of course, even now……I'm giving 
<story>my all to show that it's not 『Another World』.

data.text:
But, even with that……after coming to Tracen Academy, 
it's still thought of as 『Unreachable』 for me.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>But, even with that……after coming to Tracen Academy, 
<story>it's still thought of as 『Unreachable』 for me.

data.text:
There are times where that feels like a heavy chain holding 
me down. ……I shook off those feelings and just ran.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>There are times where that feels like a heavy chain holding 
<story>me down. ……I shook off those feelings and just ran.

data.text:
So I wouldn't be caught, serious, with all my strength, until I 
couldn't breathe. No matter how painful, without stopping my feet.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>So I wouldn't be caught, serious, with all my strength, until I 
<story>couldn't breathe. No matter how painful, without stopping my feet.

data.text:
With everything……to overturn all of it, 
I need to hit it with everything I can muster.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>With everything……to overturn all of it, 
<story>I need to hit it with everything I can muster.

data.text: ……do you have the same resolve that I do?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>……do you have the same resolve that I do?

data.text:
――Could it be that she ran so recklessly, 
to burn away everything, including her anxiety?
data.processed:
<story>――Could it be that she ran so recklessly, 
<story>to burn away everything, including her anxiety?

data.text:
『That's obvious』『I won't break here』 those words 
were probably also a way to encourage herself too.

choices.text: I want to fulfill your dream

data.processed:
<story>『That's obvious』『I won't break here』 those words 
<story>were probably also a way to encourage herself too.

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>!

data.text:
Whether it was 『Mine』 or 『Katsuragi Ace's』 dream, 
I believed both of those paths would lead to the same place.
data.processed:
<story>Whether it was 『Mine』 or 『Katsuragi Ace's』 dream, 
<story>I believed both of those paths would lead to the same place.

data.text:
……In that case, how about we test that out? 
Until the next mock race, instruct me.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>……In that case, how about we test that out? 
<story>Until the next mock race, instruct me.

data.text: And there, we'll see if our dreams are suited for each other!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>And there, we'll see if our dreams are suited for each other!

data.text:
――After that, I spent every day instructing Katsuragi Ace. 
From early morning until night, we put everything in to it, 
until we were out of breath.
data.processed:
<story>――After that, I spent every day instructing Katsuragi Ace. 
<story>From early morning until night, we put everything in to it, 
<story>until we were out of breath.

data.text: And finally……the day of the mock race arrived.
data.processed: <story>And finally……the day of the mock race arrived.

data.text:
Trainer-san, you're really nervous aren't you!? 
I do feel bad for laughing though……haha, you're shaking.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, you're really nervous aren't you!? 
<story>I do feel bad for laughing though……haha, you're shaking.

data.text:
If you're this nervous about a mock race, then your heart won't 
be able to handle what comes after! ――Oh, looks like it's starting.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>If you're this nervous about a mock race, then your heart won't 
<story>be able to handle what comes after! ――Oh, looks like it's starting.

data.text:
Right, I'm heading out! 
Make sure you take a good look, Trainer-san!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Right, I'm heading out! 
<story>Make sure you take a good look, Trainer-san!

data.text:
In today's mock race, there would be a lot of Uma Musume with high 
expectations. There's no way I wouldn't be nervous. However……!
data.processed:
<story>In today's mock race, there would be a lot of Uma Musume with high 
<story>expectations. There's no way I wouldn't be nervous. However……!

data.text: Finally, the mock race is starting!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>Finally, the mock race is starting!

data.text:
I-is this Katsuragi Ace's strategy!? 
She's running away, taking an incredible lead!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>I-is this Katsuragi Ace's strategy!? 
<story>She's running away, taking an incredible lead!

data.text: Will she make it to the end like this!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>Will she make it to the end like this!?

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! 
Make it to the end, they said……!? Haa, of course I will!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa……! 
<story>Make it to the end, they said……!? Haa, of course I will!

data.text:
Haa, hahahaa……! Trainer-san, are you watching!? 
Your instructions……weren't bad at all!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Haa, hahahaa……! Trainer-san, are you watching!? 
<story>Your instructions……weren't bad at all!

data.text: There's nobody behind me right……!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>There's nobody behind me right……!?

data.text:
This is my run…… 
Nobody will be able to catch me!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>This is my run…… 
<story>Nobody will be able to catch me!!

data.text:
Destroying all obstacles and common sense…… 
I'll stand in front……of all those that they admire!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Destroying all obstacles and common sense…… 
<story>I'll stand in front……of all those that they admire!!

data.text: ――The Ace is me!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>――The Ace is me!!

data.text: Just leave it to me!!!!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Just leave it to me!!!!!

data.text:
First place is Katsuragi Ace! It's Katsuragi Ace!! 
Pulling so far away from everyone, she comes in fiiiiiirst!!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>First place is Katsuragi Ace! It's Katsuragi Ace!! 
<story>Pulling so far away from everyone, she comes in fiiiiiirst!!

data.text:
Trainer-san! Did you see that!? How was that!? 
That was the result from following your instructions!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san! Did you see that!? How was that!? 
<story>That was the result from following your instructions!

data.text: Hahaa! We showed 'em! Don't you think!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Hahaa! We showed 'em! Don't you think!?

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace was laughing impishly. 
Her sweat told the story of just how fierce it was.

choices.text: It's because of Katsuragi Ace's strength……

data.processed:
<story>Katsuragi Ace was laughing impishly. 
<story>Her sweat told the story of just how fierce it was.

data.text: Then, that means this is OUR strength.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Then, that means this is OUR strength.

data.text:
Which means……with both of our powers combined, 
there isn't a dream we can't fulfill! Ain't that right!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Which means……with both of our powers combined, 
<story>there isn't a dream we can't fulfill! Ain't that right!?

data.text:
……Saying that, she laughed again. 
I guess that means she's accepted me as a trainer.

choices.text: There's no way we can't fulfill them!

data.processed:
<story>……Saying that, she laughed again. 
<story>I guess that means she's accepted me as a trainer.

data.text: Yeah! You got that right!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Yeah! You got that right!!

data.text:
Hey, Trainer-san. I will become the Uma Musume world's Ace, 
without a doubt. ……What's your dream?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Trainer-san. I will become the Uma Musume world's Ace, 
<story>without a doubt. ……What's your dream?

data.text: Alright! Once again, looking forward to it!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Alright! Once again, looking forward to it!

data.text:
We'll show them that no dream is too big for us! 
Let's show all of them!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>We'll show them that no dream is too big for us! 
<story>Let's show all of them!
